getContentDescription().Description: Returns content description for the ListRow. By default it returns @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem#getContentDescription_E@ or @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem#getName_E@, unless @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow#setContentDescription_E@ was explicitly called.

Parameters: CharSequence: Content description sets on the ListRow.
setContentDescription(java.lang.CharSequ.Description: Explicitly set content description for the ListRow, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow#getContentDescription_E@ will ignore values from HeaderItem.

getAdapter().Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter_E@ that represents a list of objects.

ClassDesc: A @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row_E@ composed of a optional @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem_E@, and an @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter_E@ describing the items in the list.
